creditline: The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two sections; shorter section backed with blue fabric is pieced with central pastel striped fabric bordered by white fabric printed with tiny pink and yellow flowers and embroidered bands and red floral printed fabric; longer section backed with grey and pastel woven fabrics has three brocade bands (one with metallic silver threads) and six embroidered cross stitched rectangles in predominately pinks and purples; red and white tassels with beads at one short end
title: Headdress
